label: A4B_tP10_125_m_a-001
title: PtPb$_{4}$ ($D1_{d}$) Structure
comments:
(R\"{o}sler, 1951) give the structure in setting 1 of space group $P4/nbm$ \#125.  We have shifted this to our standard setting 2. 
 (Pearson, 1958) states that this structure is related to \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_tI12_140_h_a-001}{$C16$ khatyrkite (Al$_{2}$Cu)}.
